dropdown_placeholder: Click Me To Select an Option
embed_text:
What’s up! Thanks for reaching out! In order to assist with your request faster, we now have an automated menu. Please select one of these options from the dropdown below. Be sure to read the descriptions of the options to choose the option that best suits your needs.
(Options)
> 👮 - Moderation Team
> 🤝 - Partnership Team
> 💰 - Marketing Team 
> 🏢 - Human Resources
> ⚙️ - Team Managers
> 👑 - Executive Team 
> ❓ - General Question
*To view all options in the dropdown menu, it may be necessary to scroll.*

__**Please keep in mind that Ocean Support is not live chat and we are humans responding. Please bare with us and we appreciate your patience as we look forward to servicing your request.**__

A ✅ reaction indicates that your message has been received by our Support Team.

moderation_team.label: Moderation Team
moderation_team.description: Use this option to report a user for breaking the rules.

partnership_team.label: Partnership Team
partnership_team.description: Use this option to partner with Ocean Advertising.

marketing_team.label: Marketing Team
marketing_team.description: Use this option to inquire about our paid promotions and other services.

human_resources.label: Human Resources
human_resources.description: Use this option to report a staff member or to appeal a punishment.

executive_team.label: Executive Team
executive_team.description: Use this option to report a member of HR or a Team Manager, or to speak directly to an Executive.

general_question.label: General Question
general_question.description: Use this option for any general questions about our server.
